BESA.Util

Class PeriodicDataBESA

  • java.lang.Object
    • BESA.Kernel.Agent.Event.DataBESA
      • BESA.Util.PeriodicDataBESA
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class PeriodicDataBESA
extends DataBESA
    This class represents the configuration data for the periodic thread of one periodic guard.
    Since:
    JDK1.0
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • PeriodicDataBESA

        public PeriodicDataBESA(long periodicTime,
                java.lang.String call)
        Crrates a new instance of the data type for configuration of the periodic thread.
        Parameters:
        periodicTime - Ttime out between periodics.
        call - Command that defines the state the periodic thread. The states could be: START, STOP or SUSPEND.

      • PeriodicDataBESA

        public PeriodicDataBESA(java.lang.String call)
        Creates a new instance of the data type for configuration of the periodic thread as wiht defaults values.
        Parameters:
        call - Command that defines the state the periodic thread. The states could be: START, STOP or SUSPEND.
